entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:51 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 2:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 31 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
